絢爛 [ xuàn làn ]: splendid; gorgeous; dazzling

Kanshudo_mnemonic: in a season (旬) the thread (糸) is made into a gorgeous fabric
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Shito " and " Xun ", the original meaning is colorful appearance and literary appearance. "Said Wen": "The Poetry says: I thought it was gorgeous. From Shito, Xunsheng." "The Analects of Confucius. Bayi": "Qingy smile, beautiful eyes look forward to Xi, I always thought it was gorgeous." He Yan : "Awesome, artistic appearance."

" Xuan " can mean shine and shine. Jin Zuosi "Shu Du Fu": "Thinking about beautiful morality, arranging the algae in the heaven."

" Xuan " also means to confuse Dazzle. "Qingpingshantang Script-Neck-Necked Mandarin Duck Meeting": "Therefore, the colors are gorgeous in the eyes, the emotions are in the heart, the erotic colors are in harmony, and the mind and eyes look at each other."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Shito " and " Xun ", the original meaning is colorful appearance and literary appearance.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「旬」聲，本義為多彩貌、文采貌。《說文》：「《詩》云：素以爲絢兮。从糸，旬聲。」《論語‧八佾》：「巧笑倩兮，美目盼兮，素以為絢兮。」何晏集解：「絢，文貌。」

　　「絢」可表示輝映、照耀。晉左思〈蜀都賦〉：「幽思絢道德，摛藻掞天庭。」

　　「絢」還表示使眩惑迷亂。《清平山堂話本‧刎頸鴛鴦會》：「故色絢于目，情惑于心，情色相生，心目相視。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「旬」聲，本義為多彩貌、文采貌。

(Simplified: 绚)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 旬 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
Kanshudo mnemonic:in a season (旬) the thread (糸) is made into a gorgeous fabric
Hanzi: 绚

從「 糸 」，「 旬 」聲，本義為多彩貌、文采貌。《說文》：「《詩》云：素以爲絢兮。从糸，旬聲。」《論語‧八佾》：「巧笑倩兮，美目盼兮，素以為絢兮。」何晏集解：「絢，文貌。」 「 絢 」可表示輝映、照耀。晉左思〈蜀都賦〉：「幽思絢道德，摛藻掞天庭。」 「 絢 」還表示使眩惑迷亂。《清平山堂話本‧刎頸鴛鴦會》：「故色絢于目，情惑于心，情色相生，心目相視。」
From the sound of " Shito" and " Xun", the original meaning is colorful appearance and literary appearance. "Said Wen": "The Poetry says: I thought it was gorgeous. From Shito, Xunsheng." "The Analects of Confucius. Bayi": "Qingy smile, beautiful eyes look forward to Xi, I always thought it was gorgeous." He Yan : "Awesome, artistic appearance." " Xuan" can mean shine and shine. Jin Zuosi "Shu Du Fu": "Thinking about beautiful morality, arranging the algae in the heaven." " Xuan" also means to confuse Dazzle. "Qingpingshantang Script-Neck-Necked Mandarin Duck Meeting": "Therefore, the colors are gorgeous in the eyes, the emotions are in the heart, the erotic colors are in harmony, and the mind and eyes look at each other."

絢字的基本解释

絢
xuàn
见“绚”。

絢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuàn］
［《廣韻》許縣切，去霰，曉。］
“绚1”的繁体字。
(1)文采貌；多彩貌。
(2)辉映；照耀。
(3)使眩惑迷乱。
(4)见“絢練”。

絢字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絢； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页923第01
【廣韻】許縣切【集韻】翾縣切【正韻】翾眩切，?音眴。【儀禮·聘禮】問諸侯，朱綠繅八寸，皆?纁繫，長尺絢組。【註】采成文曰絢繫，無事則以繫玉，因以爲飾。【論語】素以爲絢兮。【何晏註】絢，文貌。　又【顏延之·赭白馬賦】絢練?絕。【註】疾貌。　又【集韻】熒絹切，音炫。義同。　又【集韻】松倫切，音旬。【類篇】紃，或作絢。詳紃字註。　又【韻補】叶須閏切。【潘岳·夏侯常侍誄】如彼隨和，發彩流潤，如彼綿繢，列素點絢。

絢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
絢字的起名意思

暂无。
